name: shipping-insurance-blockchain
description: Dự án blockchain bảo hiểm vận chuyển cho sinh viên đại học

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:contracts:smart" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:oracle"
scripts.dev:all:preserve: concurrently "npm run dev:contracts:preserve" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:oracle"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd contracts && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../oracle && npm install
scripts.build:contracts: cd contracts && npm run compile && npm run deploy
scripts.build:contracts:preserve: cd contracts && npm run compile && npm run deploy:preserve
scripts.deploy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/smart-deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:preserve: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-persistent.js --network localhost_persistent
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:contracts
scripts.setup:preserve: npm run install:all && npm run build:contracts:preserve
scripts.reset:blockchain: cd contracts && rm -rf blockchain-state contract-state.json && echo 'Blockchain state reset'
scripts.backup:blockchain: cd contracts && tar -czf blockchain-backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).tar.gz blockchain-state contract-state.json && echo 'Blockchain state backed up'

author: Sinh viên đại học
